During several of our matches in the last few days we would get an error telling us that our spark maxes for our drive motors “Timed out while waiting for Periodic Status 1” and we’d be stuck in place. Restarting our robot code fixes it but if anybody knows how we can fix this please let me know.\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2023-03-13T15:51:25.506Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":32,"reads":169,"readers_count":168,"score":193.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":430069,"topic_slug":"swerve-spark-maxes-timing-out-shutting-us-down","display_username":"Falon Clark","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":57393,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"The Kotlin Guy"},"post_url":"/t/swerve-spark-maxes-timing-out-shutting-us-down/430069/1","custom_user_title":"The Kotlin Guy","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true,"can_vote":false},{"id":3163561,"name":"Emile Hamwey","username":"EmileH","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/emileh/{size}/254137_2.png","created_at":"2023-03-13T15:56:07.321Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eThis sounds like an issue with your CAN bus wiring.
